020
021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
024import net.tnemc.core.utils.Identifier;
025import net.tnemc.core.utils.Monetary;
026import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
027
028import java.math.BigDecimal;
029import java.util.Optional;
030import java.util.UUID;
031
032/**
033 * Represents an entry for holdings. This contains all the information including region, currency
034 * and the actual BigDecimal Holdings.
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 0.1.2.0
038 */
039public class HoldingsEntry {
040
041  /**
042   * The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be something else such as a
043   * world guard region name/identifier.
044   */
045  private String region;
046
047  /**
048   * The identifier of the currency involved.
049   */
050  private UUID currency;
051
052  /**
053   * The {@link BigDecimal amount} that this charge is for.
054   */
055  private BigDecimal amount;
056
057  /**
058   * The {@link Identifier type} that this should be used for this.
059   */
060  private Identifier handler = new Identifier("TNE", "VIRTUAL_HOLDINGS");
061
062  private Monetary monetary;
063
064  /**
065   * Constructs an object that represents a holding's entry.
066   *
067   * @param region   The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be
068   *                 something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
069   * @param currency The identifier of the currency involved.
070   * @param amount   The {@link BigDecimal amount} that this charge is for.
071   */
072  public HoldingsEntry(final @NotNull String region, final @NotNull UUID currency,
073                       final @NotNull BigDecimal amount, final @NotNull Identifier handler) {
074
075    this.region = region;
076    this.currency = currency;
077    this.amount = amount;
078    this.handler = handler;
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Constructs an object that represents a holdings entry from a {@link HoldingsModifier}.
083   *
084   * @param modifier The modifier to build this entry from.
085   */
086  public HoldingsEntry(final @NotNull HoldingsModifier modifier) {
087
088    this.region = modifier.getRegion();
089    this.currency = modifier.getCurrency();
090    this.amount = modifier.getModifier();
091  }
092
093  public void modify(final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
094
095    amount = modifier.modify(amount);
096  }
097
098  public HoldingsEntry modifyGrab(final BigDecimal modifier) {
099
100    final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(region, currency, amount, handler);
101    entry.modify(new HoldingsModifier(region, currency, modifier));
102    return entry;
103  }
104
105  public HoldingsEntry modifyGrab(final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
106
107    final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(region, currency, amount, handler);
108    entry.modify(modifier);
109    return entry;
110  }
111
112  public Optional<Currency> currency() {
113
114    return TNECore.eco().currency().find(currency);
115  }
116
117  public UUID getCurrency() {
118
119    return currency;
120  }
121
122  public void setCurrency(final UUID currency) {
123
124    this.currency = currency;
125  }
126
127  public String getRegion() {
128
129    return region;
130  }
131
132  public void setRegion(final String region) {
133
134    this.region = region;
135  }
136
137  public BigDecimal getAmount() {
138
139    return amount;
140  }
141
142  public Monetary asMonetary() {
143
144    if(monetary != null) {
145      return monetary;
146    }
147    final Optional<Currency> cur = currency();
148    monetary = new Monetary(amount, cur.map(Currency::getDecimalPlaces).orElse(2));
149    return monetary;
150  }
151
152  public void setAmount(final BigDecimal amount) {
153
154    this.amount = amount;
155    final Optional<Currency> cur = currency();
156    monetary = new Monetary(amount, cur.map(Currency::getDecimalPlaces).orElse(2));
157  }
158
159  public Identifier getHandler() {
160
161    return handler;
162  }
163
164  public void setHandler(final Identifier handler) {
165
166    this.handler = handler;
167  }
168}
